item.description: Character Counter function count(form, val) { "use strict"; var wis, wos, line; if (!val) return; wis = val.replace(/\n/g, ""); form.within_space.value = wis.length; wos = val.replace(/\s| /g, ""); form.without_space.value = wos.length; line = val.match(/\n/g); form.lines.value = line && line.length + 1 || "1"; } body { font-size: 100%; width: 50%; margin: 10px auto; text-align: center; } textarea { width: 100%; height: 50%; } table { color: black; background: lavender; margin: 10px auto; padding: 8px; border-radius: 0.
